sentences.sentence: ABSTRACT: In this issue, we will introduce you the biodynamics which is one of the most controversial topics in the wine world.
sentences.translation: 摘要： 本期连环话将为你解读葡萄酒界最具争议的话题之一——生物动力法。

sentences.sentence: Over the years, I have found the study of the cycle of the earth, and of biodynamics to be very helpful in my kindergarten work.
sentences.translation: 在过去的几年里，我发现学习地球的循环和生物动力农业对我的幼儿园工作非常有帮助。

sentences.sentence: By researching the biodynamics and actual match, It is that a tall player have proved adequate to a three marks 'ball, his tactical value is more satisfactory.
sentences.translation: 通过生物力学和实战研究得出，高身材运动员有利于成为更好的三分球选手，其战术价值更大。
